SELECT * FROM (SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PRIVATE_EMAIL, M.GRADE, M.ADDRESS, M.ADDRESS2 , M.PHONE, M.PROFILE_NAME, M.POSITION_NO, M.BANK_NO, M.ACCOUNT, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.UPDATE_DATE , M.START_DATE, M.QUIT_DATE, M.QUIT_YN , P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.QUIT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M.ENROLL_DATE DESC) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PRIVATE_EMAIL, M.GRADE, M.ADDRESS, M.ADDRESS2 , M.PHONE, M.PROFILE_NAME, M.POSITION_NO, M.BANK_NO, M.ACCOUNT, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.UPDATE_DATE , M.START_DATE, M.QUIT_DATE, M.QUIT_YN ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.QUIT_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY M.QUIT_YN , M.ENROLL_DATE DESC)
SELECT DISTINCT M.NAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN POSITION P USING(NO) WHERE M.QUIT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M.NAME

SELECT D.NO, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME , P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, M.NAME , D.UPPER_DEPT, D.LEV, D.DELETE_YN, D.CREATE_DATE FROM DEPT D JOIN POSITION P ON D.NO = P.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.DEPT_NO = M.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO WHERE D.DELETE_YN = 'N' START WITH UPPER_DEPT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR D.NO = D.UPPER_DEPT

SELECT P.NO, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, COUNT(M.NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM POSITION P JOIN DEPT D ON D.NO = P.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.DEPT_NO = M.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO GROUP BY P.NO, P.NAME ORDER BY P.NO

SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.PROFILE_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.NAME LIKE '%${search}%' AND M.QUIT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.NO ASC
